extendedInfo.description: Slender Man! is a brand new 3D survival horror game based upon the Slender Man (slenderman) legend. See how long you can survive before Slender Man gets you, with only your wits to aid you!  This is the free version which contains 1 level. For more Slend man action, buy the full version.Can you find all the hidden pages before Slender Man gets you?We promise to respond promptly to suggestions and and bugs.  Just send me e-mail and be sure to include what device you are running on.Please note that the game itself is in English.If the games lags, turn off Image Effects in the Options menu!I can't tell you how much it means to me to get up every morning and read all the compliments and useful suggestions from you all.  You guys rock!NOTE: Samsung Galaxy Y user have reported issues.  Some older ARM6 phones may not be able to run correctly. Sorry.If you like the game, please rate.  5 star ratings help get updates and more features!

reviews.title: Needs Some Work
reviews.comment: The closest anyone has come to making a good slender game so far, but not scary at all. The way he pops out at you is not scary, its like \"oh, he\'s there\", and when you die, its not scary. He doesn\'t even get close to you. It\'s a good app, but keep working on it, and it\'ll be great.
reviews.author: Brandonc Spike

reviews.comment: Its cool but the pages are hard to find which makes it cooler  slender shouldn\'t walk though\tEPIC GAME MUST HAVE IF U R A SLENDER FAN OR WANT TO SCARE UR SIBLINGS! (Thats what I did) lol
reviews.author: Aj Luter

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I was doing so good! Only had 3 more pages to find and he got me! Geeze, my heart is still racing xD I loved the app, though!
reviews.author: Lovely Shyckor

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: I just love it! Best slender man game ever highly recommended. peace off!
reviews.author: KoolCat Barton

reviews.title: eh
reviews.comment: definitely a start in the right direction. you can see most of the pages from a distance, you might wanna fix that. once you fix the bugs and smooth everything out, it\'ll be a decent game.  make it more eerie and it\'ll be amazing.
reviews.author: Remington Martin

reviews.title: MEExciting!!!! Game!!!!!
reviews.comment: THIS IS A GREAT GAME. YOU ARE GOING AROUND LOOKING FOR THE NOTES THAT YOU HAVE TO FIND. THEN SOMETIMES WITHOUT WARNING HE APPEARS AND IT IS GAME OVER. OTHER TIMES YOU ARE HAVING GOOD LUCK FINDING THE NOTES AND AGAIN WITHOUT WARNING HE IS THERE. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS GAME.
reviews.author: RODOLFO GUERRERO

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: I played this on my friends ipad and i got all the nites but i didnt see the last one in the house and how the notes tell where he is like the pic with him in the woods and it also gives u a warning like the tentical note
reviews.author: Cory Eden

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: Scared the **** out of me :D just please optimize it a bit for low-end armv7 devices like my xperia miro...the music cuts off all the time. You\'ve made the best slender-man game on play store,no doubt. :)
reviews.author: Stefan Djokic

reviews.title: Will buy soon
reviews.comment: Please invert y axis,  everything else is very good,  this one is so good I don\'t even want too download the other ones on android
reviews.author: Chris Lepe

reviews.title: Oh gosh
reviews.comment: Oh gosh super scary. You just don\'t know when slendy is gnna pop up. >. <  Excellent game!

reviews.title: DROIDX
reviews.comment: Its ok needs work, its hard to control i was walking straight and the game turned around and slendy was right there and i died so needs improvement

reviews.title: Really hard to find the last page
reviews.comment: I had one more page left then it said game over I\'m not playing again because I couldn\'t find the last page

reviews.title: Terrifying...
reviews.comment: Oh Gosh! Its scary when slenderman pops out!!! But sometimes is lag and can\'t find the options

reviews.title: SCARY
reviews.comment: I like it... I kept walking when I got to the bloody house or whatever I shut the game off lol I didn\'t wanna go in :/
reviews.author: Joesaydee Rodriguez

reviews.title: Cant really judge
reviews.comment: I didnt really give it a chance. I am too used to playing inverted and there isnt an option to change it. But from i seen the graphics looked good and would have been playable if i could play it that way
reviews.author: chris harrison

reviews.title: Great thrill!
reviews.comment: Didn\'t expect much going into this but after giving It a try I really got sucked in!  Alone with an extremely distorted fov, Slender at every turn, spider legs ah crawling dark tunez ah playin! Ugh, creepy stuff.  ;)

reviews.title: Fix
reviews.comment: Crashes every time I go on so I can\'t start the game. Fix please. Uninstall until it\'s done.

reviews.title: Doesnt Work
reviews.comment: Its gets to a screen with options for new game help etc but doesnt work i cant click screen buttons or anything in the game, it seems like it would be a good game if it would work So im uninstalling it sorry :(

reviews.title: I love it . It scares me every time

reviews.title: cool game
reviews.comment: good grafx and use of color. the sound is really cool i really like the whispers you hear. overall very well done but needs a little polishing before i drop the wallet. . .
